DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate investigator improve physical activity social participation level among Veterans diabetes .
DOC.detailed_description: Physical activity cornerstone good diabetes management , yet effective physical activity intervention available . The investigator develop lifestyle intervention base individual 's home activity pattern . The goal study test efficacy intervention among Veterans diabetes randomized-controlled trial . In addition physical activity , investigator also assess intervention improve social participation among Veterans .
DOC.criteria: Veterans Aged 60 year old Has Type 2 diabetes mellitus Able operate accelerometer Competent consent study No dementia diagnosis Ambulatory without assistive device Englishspeaking Community living ( i.e. , nursing home resident ) Not physically active regular basis ( less 150 minute moderate vigorous physical activity per week ) Medically unstable Hospitalized within last 6 month 2 day complete bed rest last month hemiplegia limb amputation Selfreported illness condition would impair cooperation study team ability complete study work involve shift schedule current enrollment physical activity program replacement hip knee within last 6 month . Parkinson 's disease frequent fall
